markdown:
Summary : This is a product label for Alexandre Family Farm 100% Grass-Fed A2/A2 Organic Plain Yogurt, highlighting certifications, product features, and packaging details.

photo:
Scene Overview :
  • The main subject is the front label of a yogurt container.
  • The label is cream-colored with green text and graphics.
  • Prominently features the brand name "Alexandre Family Farm" and a cow illustration on the left.
  • The product is described as "100% Grass-Fed A2/A2 Organic Plain Yogurt" with "Extra Cream Top."
  • Certifications and seals are visible, including "Certified Grass-Fed," "Certified Humane," "USDA Organic," and "Regenerative Organic Certified."
  • The net weight is listed as "24 OZ (680g)."

Technical Details :
  • Multiple certification logos and seals are present.
  • Text includes "Certified Regenerative," "Stir Well," and "Non-Homogenized."
  • The cow illustration is positioned on the left side of the label.
  • The background includes a green field graphic at the bottom.

Spatial Relationships :
  • Brand name and product type are centered and occupy the upper and middle portions.
  • Certifications and seals are distributed along the sides.
  • The cow illustration is on the left, with the field graphic spanning the bottom.

Analysis :
  • The label emphasizes organic, grass-fed, and regenerative farming practices.
  • Multiple certifications are used to appeal to health- and environmentally-conscious consumers.
  • The design uses green to reinforce natural and organic qualities. <!-- figure, from page 0 (l=0.088,t=0.183,r=0.897,b=0.986), with ID 2532097e-6953-48ff-83ae-406a9c86f0cb -->
